description: Several thefts from cars and a burglary at a house are reported in Burgess Hill on the same day.
title: West Sussex: Car thefts and a burglary spark police investigation
title_page: West Sussex: Car thefts and a burglary spark police investigation - BBC News
maintext:
Police have launched an investigation after several break-ins in West Sussex.
Officers received reports of thefts from cars and a break-in at a house, where car keys and a car were stolen, on Monday in the Kings Weald area of Burgess Hill.
Sussex Police said the car was found after the offenders were involved in a crash and abandoned the vehicle.
Sgt Ryan Oakley said the force was taking the incidents "extremely seriously".
